I'm the head of economic planning unit at [Mexico's Ministry of Finance](https://www.gob.mx/shcp). Have worked at the [Institute of International Finance](https://www.iif.com/), [IMF's](http://www.imf.org/external/index.htm) Western Hemisphere Department, the [Inter-American Development Bank](https://www.iadb.org/), and the [Central Bank of Mexico](http://www.banxico.org.mx/). I hold a M.A. in economics from [El Colegio de Mexico](https://www.colmex.mx/) and a B.A. degree in economics from the [UNAM](http://www.economia.unam.mx/). My research focuses on macroeconomics, with emphasis on the credibility of inflation regimes in Latin America, sovereign debt restructurings, and commodity prices
